entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
